title: WATCH: Minnie Dlamini pays tribute to her brother with touching video
text:
WATCH: Minnie Dlamini pays tribute to her brother with touching video share this

Johannesburg – Minnie Dlamini has shared a touching tribute to her brother Khosini who died from a ruptured brain aneurysm in late September.

The TV personality broke her silence for the first time last week, sharing an emotional tweet with fans.

Now, opening up once again, Minnie has posted a video on Instagram, capturing some of the greatest moments she shared with Khosini. "Now I have to learn to live without you," she captioned the clip.

The short video begins with Khosini talking about Minnie and how she would protect him as a child.

"Every time I was in any altercation with a teacher or another student trying to bully me, she was always the first one there without me knowing," he says.
description: Minnie has posted a video on Instagram, capturing some of the greatest moments she shared with Khosini.
